languages.text: Корабль без опознавательных знаков висит над пустотной станцией, облепленной десантными катерами. Картина вырисовывается ясная — пираты захватили имперский форпост. Авгуры фиксируют, что пиратское судно разогревает двигатели и спешно перезаряжает орудия — готовится к бою.

You sight a ship hovering over a void station. The vessel bears no identifying marks, but the landing craft swarming the station below makes the situation clear: pirates have seized an Imperial outpost. The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.
languages.original_text: Корабль без опознавательных знаков висит над пустотной станцией, облепленной десантными катерами. Картина вырисовывается ясная — пираты захватили имперский форпост. Авгуры фиксируют, что пиратское судно разогревает двигатели и спешно перезаряжает орудия — готовится к бою.

traits.locale_text: An unidentified ship is hovering over a voidstation covered all over with landing craft. The situation looks clear enough: pirates have seized an imperial outpost. The augurs note that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It's preparing for battle.

The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.

languages.text: 你看到一艘飞船在虚空站上方盘旋。这艘船没有任何用来识别的标识，但飞船下方无数登陆艇朝星站蜂拥而去。很显然，一群海盗占领了帝国的前哨站。扫描结果显示，这艘海盗船正在预热引擎，而且正在迅速重新装填大炮。它正在进行战斗准备。
languages.original_text: You sight a ship hovering over a void station. The vessel bears no identifying marks, but the landing craft swarming the station below makes the situation clear: pirates have seized an Imperial outpost. The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.

traits.locale_text: 你看到一艘飞船在虚空站上方盘旋。这艘船没有任何用来识别的标识，但飞船下方无数登陆艇朝星站蜂拥而去。很显然，一群海盗占领了帝国的前哨站。扫描结果显示，这艘海盗船正在预热引擎，而且正在迅速重新装填大炮。它正在进行战斗准备。

languages.text: Avistas una nave situada junto a una estación del vacío. Aunque la nave no lleva marcas identificativas, los transportes de desembarco que rodean la estación dejan clara la situación: los piratas han tomado un puesto avanzado imperial. Los augures detectan que la nave pirata está calentando motores y cargando los cañones. Se dispone a entrar en combate.
languages.original_text: You sight a ship hovering over a void station. The vessel bears no identifying marks, but the landing craft swarming the station below makes the situation clear: pirates have seized an Imperial outpost. The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.

traits.locale_text: Avistas una nave situada junto a una estación del vacío. Aunque la nave no lleva marcas identificativas, los transportes de desembarco que rodean la estación dejan clara la situación: los piratas han tomado un puesto avanzado imperial. Los augures detectan que la nave pirata está calentando motores y cargando los cañones. Se dispone a entrar en combate.

languages.text: ヴォイドステーション上空に船がホバリングしているのを目撃する。船には識別できる印がないが、下のステーションに群がる上陸用の船を見るに、海賊が帝国の前哨基地を占拠したのは明らかだ。スキャナーは海賊船がエンジンを温め、キャノン砲を素早く再装填していることを検出する。戦闘の準備をしているようだ。
languages.original_text: You sight a ship hovering over a void station. The vessel bears no identifying marks, but the landing craft swarming the station below makes the situation clear: pirates have seized an Imperial outpost. The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドステーション上空に船がホバリングしているのを目撃する。船には識別できる印がないが、下のステーションに群がる上陸用の船を見るに、海賊が帝国の前哨基地を占拠したのは明らかだ。スキャナーは海賊船がエンジンを温め、キャノン砲を素早く再装填していることを検出する。戦闘の準備をしているようだ。

languages.text: Du erblickst ein Schiff, das über einer Leerenstation schwebt. Das Schiff trägt keinerlei Erkennungszeichen, doch die Landeshuttle, die auf die Station darunter schwärmen, machen die Lage klar: Piraten haben einen imperialen Außenposten erobert. Die Auguren stellen fest, dass das Piratenschiff seine Triebwerke aufwärmt und schnell seine Geschütze nachlädt. Es rüstet sich zum Kampf.
languages.original_text: You sight a ship hovering over a void station. The vessel bears no identifying marks, but the landing craft swarming the station below makes the situation clear: pirates have seized an Imperial outpost. The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.

traits.locale_text: Du erblickst ein Schiff, das über einer Leerenstation schwebt. Das Schiff trägt keinerlei Erkennungszeichen, doch die Landeshuttle, die auf die Station darunter schwärmen, machen die Lage klar: Piraten haben einen imperialen Außenposten erobert. Die Auguren stellen fest, dass das Piratenschiff seine Triebwerke aufwärmt und schnell seine Geschütze nachlädt. Es rüstet sich zum Kampf.

languages.text: Vous apercevez un vaisseau arrêté au-dessus d'une station spatiale. L'appareil ne porte aucune marque distinctive, mais les engins de débarquement éparpillés dans la station en contrebas ne laissent pas de place au doute : des pirates se sont emparés d'un avant-poste impérial. Les augures signalent que la vaisseau pirate fait chauffer ses moteurs et recharge ses canons. Il se prépare au combat.
languages.original_text: You sight a ship hovering over a void station. The vessel bears no identifying marks, but the landing craft swarming the station below makes the situation clear: pirates have seized an Imperial outpost. The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.

Les augures signalent que la vaisseau pirate fait chauffer ses moteurs et recharge ses canons. Il se prépare au combat.

languages.text: Uçsuz istasyonunun üzerinde süzülen bir gemi olduğunu fark ediyorsunuz. Geminin üzerinde hiçbir tanımlayıcı işaret bulunmasa da istasyonun etrafında dolaşan çıkarma araçları, durumu net bir şekilde ortaya koyuyor: Korsanlar, İmparatorluk karakolunu ele geçirmiş. Alametler, korsan gemisinin motorlarını ısıttığını ve toplarını hızla yeniden doldurduğunu tespit ediyor. Gemi, çatışmaya hazırlanıyor.

The augurs detect that the pirate ship is warming up its engines and quickly reloading its cannons. It is preparing for battle.
